answers.answer: There is not enough information in your post to provide a clear answer. You didn't tell us what you're doing to control and manage your diabetes, what your last A1c [HbA1c, HgbA1c, HA1c] results were, if you're home testing your blood sugars, they're results, your current diet, your current lifestyle, etc.There several factors which could lead to high uric acid and high blood pressure. What did your doctor inform you as the causes? What are you doing to lower the UA and BP? Again, what is your current diet consist of? If we knew i detail the latter we possibly could inform you which foods to eliminate and which foods to add.

question: what kind of diet is recommended for a patient who has diabetes together with Blood pressure and Uric Acid.?? Your Reply will be very much appreciated. Thanks.... Pranit
title: Diabetes, Blood pressure, Uric Acid
